item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67 South
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 South (Legacy Parkway) to Salt Lake City.

item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 (Legacy Parkway).

item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 (Legacy Parkway). Use UT-67 north for Farmington; UT-67 south for Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 395 and 394 - Approaching I-15
item.description: US-89 South at Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. Approaching Exit 394 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway. US-89 joins I-15 southbound for Salt Lake City. Use Exit 395 for access to Lagoon Amusement Park.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 397, 396, and 394
item.description: US-89 South at Exit 397 - UT-273/Farmington/Kaysville. Approaching Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane. Approaching Exit 394 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: Legacy Parkway - Exits 12 and 13
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 12 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching I-15 North/Ogden. Approaching the northern end of Legacy Parkway.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exits 11,12,13
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 11- US-89 North/South Ogden. Approaching Exit 12 - UT-225/Park Lane. Also approaching Exit 13 - I-15/Ogden.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 7
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 7 - UT-105/Parrish Lane.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 4
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 26 and 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Approaching Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden. Trucks are not allowed to use Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 26
item.description: I-215 north approaching Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden.

item.title: End UT-67 South
item.description: End UT-67 south at I-215. There are no ramps for UT-67 south to I-215, just a left merge lane.

item.title: UT-67 South - Exit 4
item.description: UT-67 south at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: UT-67 South - Exit 7
item.description: UT-67 south (Legacy Parkway) at Exit 7 - Parrish Lane. The logo above the Parrish Lane text is for Legacy Parkway.

item.title: UT-67 South - Legacy Parkway
item.description: UT-67 south with Legacy Parkway sign and Utah Scenic Byway Sign. Legacy Parkway parallels I-15 south between Farmington and Salt Lake City. It is designated as a scenic byway, and runs along the edge of the Great Salt Lake. Although the highway is an urban freeway, the speed limit is 55 MPH.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway. Continue south on I-15 for Salt Lake City. The red light on the sign is for no trucks

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Also approaching Exit 325 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Legacy Parkawy
item.description: I-15 south approaching Legacy Parkway. Trucks with more than 5 axles or greater than 80,000 pounds are prohibited for using Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 325
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 325 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.
